bug.author: BreakingBI
bug.summary: OJ Forecasting Example Notebook uses Unsupported Parameter in AutoMLConfig
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Azure/MachineLearningNotebooks/blob/master/how-to-use-azureml/automated-machine-learning/forecasting-orange-juice-sales/auto-ml-forecasting-orange-juice-sales.ipynb>https://github.com/Azure/MachineLearningNotebooks/blob/master/how-to-use-azureml/automated-machine-learning/forecasting-orange-juice-sales/auto-ml-forecasting-orange-juice-sales.ipynb</denchmark-link>
For the OJ Forecasting Example Notebook, we receive the following error when we submit the experiment. WARNING - Received unrecognized parameter: experiment_timeout_hours 0.25 This parameter is explicitly listed in the AutoMLConfig documentation. <denchmark-link:https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/python/api/azureml-train-automl-client/azureml.train.automl.automlconfig.automlconfig?view=azure-ml-py>https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/python/api/azureml-train-automl-client/azureml.train.automl.automlconfig.automlconfig?view=azure-ml-py</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Thanks for the feedback! We are currently investigating and will update you shortly.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/BreakingBI>@BreakingBI</denchmark-link> I can confirm a successful submission. Can you try again, it could be an intermittent issue or issue with your set up? Refer to my response <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Azure/MachineLearningNotebooks/issues/989>here</denchmark-link> as well.
